hero.paragraph: I'm Matt Simpson. I photograph the people, events, and businesses that drive Louisville forward. From executive headshots and corporate events to marketing campaigns and brand launches — if your business needs a camera, I'm on it.

statement.bold: Bold, professional, and built for business.
statement.text: My photography shows up on company websites, LinkedIn profiles, marketing campaigns, and brand launches across Louisville and beyond. Whether you need a single headshot or a full-day commercial shoot, I deliver images that make you look as good as you are.

about.photo_alt: Matt Simpson — professional photographer based in Louisville, Kentucky
about.label: About the Photographer
about.paragraph_1: I'm Matt Simpson, a commercial photographer based in Louisville, Kentucky. I work with businesses, executives, and organizations that need professional photography — headshots, events, and commercial campaigns — and I've been doing it for years.
about.paragraph_2: My studio is in the Germantown neighborhood of Louisville. I shoot on-location throughout Louisville, Southern Indiana (Jeffersonville, New Albany, Clarksville), and Lexington, KY. I've worked with CEOs, marketing teams, startups, and organizations of all sizes. My images end up on websites, LinkedIn, billboards, brochures, and marketing campaigns.

contact.paragraph: Ready to book a headshot session, schedule event coverage, or plan a commercial shoot? Fill out the form below or reach out directly. I work with businesses of all sizes throughout Louisville, Southern Indiana, and Lexington.
